body.p: By default lists have a left padding of 40px and their marker is outside the block box (set by the list-style-position property)

The lists are treated differently than ordinary block elements in the sense that their margins are not collapsed with the margins of the neighboring blocks or lists. This is also visible for nested lists. To summarize:
Setting the padding-left or margin-left properties on lists will move the whole list
Setting the margin-left property on list-items will move the whole list
Setting the padding-left property on list-items will only move the list-item content (not the marker) If the padding-left property is set on lists and the margin-left property is set on list-items, the result will move the whole list with a combination of both padding and margin values.
